document_name: Traditional Medicines Management Response to Term  Report (3).doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ZWE/00015710/Traditional Medicines Management Response to Term  Report (3).doc

outputs.output_descr:
Conservation status and knowledge of threatened medicinal plants improved
Stakeholdeer benefits from sustainable use of medicinal plants increased.
Cultivation of thrreatened species expanded.
Smal businesses promoted for processing and marketing of cultivated medicinal plants
Principles of sustainable use and equitable sharing of benefits from medicinal plants integrated in national and local legislation

project_descr: Conservation and Sustainable Use of Traditional Medicinal Plants in Zimbabwe.
project_title: Sustainable use of traditional medicinal plants
